answers.answer: Cause they can. And you having your baby on THIER schedual is more convinient for them.
Dont think is the doctor only some mom or asking too be induce I wish I can go the 40 qeek but am being induce at 38 because gd .

Ppl are just so impatient These days. Thry want things done when its most convenient For them. Im 39 weeks today and am tired of being pregnant and just wanna see my baby but unless theres a reason to induce me im not asking
I just beleive that unless there is harm for baby or mom, that it should happen when it's time and no sooner. There is a reason that pregnacy is 40-42 weeks. I guess I'm just old fashion.
I asked to be induced so my husband wouldn't miss it he was leaving out of state for work and if he missed it he wouldnt of seen our baby till she was 3 weeks old

question: Why do so many Dr want to induce labor? I can understand if something is wrong like preeclampsia, baby is too big or something like that, but why not let nature that it's course! I know the last month can be miserable, but I just don't get it.
title: Induction
